name: VAT Registration Number
description: "identifier for the number used within the European Union (EU) for value added tax purposes, which is used with vendors within the EU for tax-exempt deliveries for the ""EC sales list"", stored as a string
The full identifier starts with an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code and then it consists of 2 and 13 characters
The check rules are defined for each EU country and cannot be changed."
